LOCALE_13:
Czech
Originally translated by Ctihy
Ported and corrected by VladWinner
MENU_CCS_NEW_PATCH_NOTICE: An update is available, proceed with installation?
LUA_MENU_AUTO_UPDATE_DESC: Enable or disable automatic updates on startup.
LUA_MENU_DRAW_FPS_DESC: Enable or disable drawing fps or viewpos on screen.
LUA_MENU_DRAW_SPEED_DESC: Enable or disable drawing the player speed on screen.
LUA_MENU_DRAW_SPEEDGRAPH_DESC: Enable or disable the speed graph.
LUA_MENU_INTRO_DESC: Show or skip intro movie with companies' logos on startup.
LUA_MENU_SWITCH_BRANCH_DESC: Switch the h2-mod branch (develop: latest changes, main: latest stable release).
MENU_MUSIC_VOLUME_DESC: Move the slider to adjust the volume of the music.
MENU_MUSIC_VOLUME_BOOST_DESC: Move the slider to adjust the boost of the music volume.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_0: Earn all available trophies for Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2 Campaign Remastered.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_2: Get hand picked for Shepherd's elite squad.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_3: Infiltrate the snowy mountain side base.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_7: Execute the plan to help the Americans.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_10: Complete the mission in the airplane graveyard.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_11: Complete the single player campaign on any difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_12: Complete the single player campaign on Hardened or Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_13: Complete 'S.S.D.D.' and 'Team Player' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_15: Complete 'Takedown' and 'The Hornet's Nest' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_17: Complete 'The Only Easy Day... Was Yesterday' and 'The Gulag' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_19: Complete 'Of Their Own Accord', 'Second Sun', and 'Whiskey Hotel' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_20: Complete 'Loose Ends' and 'The Enemy of My Enemy' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_21: Complete 'Just Like Old Times' and 'Endgame' on Veteran difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_22: Run The Pit in 'S.S.D.D.' and finish with a final time under 30 seconds.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_23: Plant the C4 in 'Cliffhanger' without alerting or injuring anyone in the blizzard.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_24: Kill 7 chickens in under 10 seconds in 'The Hornet's Nest'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_25: Kill at least 10 enemies with one Predator Missile.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_26: Use a Riot shield to beat down an enemy.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_27: Kill 4 enemies with 4 shots during a slow-mo breach.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_28: Kill 6 enemies in a row using a thermal weapon.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_29: Kill 2 enemies with a single bullet.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_32: Kill 20 enemies in a row while driving a vehicle.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_33: Kill 2 rappelling enemies in a row before they land on their feet.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_34: Kill 5 enemies in a row using 5 different weapons or attachments.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_35: Kill 10 enemies in a row using akimbo weapons.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_36: Knife an enemy without him ever knowing you were there.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_37: Kill at least 3 enemies with a single shot from a grenade launcher.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_38: Instruct the Honey Badger to kill 80 enemies in 'Exodus'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_39: Do not get your Predator Drone destroyed in 'Contingency'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_40: Ring the red bell in both rooms and survive the attack.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_42: Complete any mission but 'S.S.D.D.' and 'Endgame' without reloading weapons or using melee attacks.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_44: Complete every missions without dying or reloading to a checkpoint at any difficulty.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_45: Destroy both BTRs without using Predator Drones in 'Wolverines!'
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_46: Kill 11 enemies using Claymores in 'Loose Ends'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_47: Destroy 10 choppers using the Javelin Launcher in 'Of Their Own Accord'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_48: Destroy the helicopter using frag grenades in 'The Only Easy Day... Was Yesterday'.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_49: The U.S. Army Rangers ain’t no place for clowns.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_50: Kill an enemy with the impact damage from a frag grenade to the head.
ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL_51: Check out Prisoner 227's cell in 'The Gulag'.
